headline: 3M Stock Soared in Q1 While the S&P 500 Struggled. Here's Why.
summary: Given the tumultuous events in April, it's easy to forget that 3M (NYSE: MMM) stock is actually up on the year; at least, it is at the time of writing!  The increase reflects a growing confidence in CEO Bill Brown's plans to turn the company's fortunes around.  Over the last decade, the company has been dogged by weak sales growth, a lack of innovation and new product introductions (NPI), uncertainty around its legal and financial exposure to its previous production of PFAS chemicals, and allegedly faulty combat arms earplugs.
